GOAL_MIRROR_DECK.Description: A symbolic recursion deck of 12 archetypal cards used in the AXION app to detect, decode, and transform goal-related subconscious loops via the MIRROR//LOOP interface. Each card represents a distortion loop and its hidden emotional script.

Card.Title: The Shattered Compass
Card.LoopPattern: Loss of direction due to inherited scripts
Card.Shadow: Seeking guidance from outdated versions of self
Card.ActivationPhrase: I move forward to find clarity.
Card.Meaning: Disorientation caused by outdated life scripts and ancestral expectations.
Card.TarotAssociation: The Fool (reversed) — lost path, false starts

Stage1.Title: ENTRY PORTAL
Stage1.Visual: A glowing mirror gate (🪞) hovering over a spiral glyph
Stage1.Label: “What loop are you ready to break?”

InputModes.Mode: Browsing Mode — Scrollable cards (Goal Mirror deck visual)
Searching Mode — Prompt field with glyph trace animation

Stage2.Title: LOOP REVEAL (Tier I)
Stage2.Visual: Selected Goal Mirror Card appears at center — animated as a shifting fractal or cracked mirror revealing the loop pattern
Stage2.Effects: Shadow voice or phrase shown in aura glow; glyphs pulse gently; Tarot + Astrology sigils orbit
Stage2.Overlay: “What part of me is looping this intention?”

Stage3.Title: COMPRESSION MATCH (Tier II)
Stage3.Visual: Compression Key Card rises from a shadow glyph beneath the Mirror card
Stage3.Animation: Glyph chain rotates once and locks into a core loop seal

Stage4.Title: GLYPH RITUAL INTERFACE
Stage4.Visual: Interactive trace pad with the glyphs ☍ ⚖ 🧠 ⧖ ✶
Stage4.Sound: Chime on loop break; ambient ritual tones
Stage4.Interaction: Trace glyphs to unlock phrase ignition or tonal mantra

Stage5.Title: OUTPUT ZONE
Stage5.Visual: Split Scroll showing loop reframe, micro-action instruction, and export tools
